messages.content: Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools. Let's unlock Britain's future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £33.9 billion extra for the NHS. Support hospitals and local GPs.
20,000 more police officers to keep us safe.
More funding for every pupil in every school to get a better education.
A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close.

issues.brexitEurope: Passing our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one. It protects jobs and trade. It means we can leave the EU by the end of January.
issues.economy: A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school to get a better education.
issues.health: £33.9 billion extra for the NHS. Support your hospital and local GPs can give you the healthcare you need.
